page.title: 06School Timetable
page.content:
8.45. Mathematics and English - integrated work session 10.00. Swimming - school learner pool provided by Parent Teacher Association 10.30.-10.50. Playtime 10.50. Hymn Practice for all the juniors 11.30. English Dictation 12.00. Lunch playtime 1.00. Art - drawing, modelling, printing, or pottery. 2.05. Afternoon playtime 2.15. Packing up art materials 2.45. Listening to story read by teacher 3.15. End of school Clubs after school till 4.00. - gymnastics, athletics, netball, football or badminton.
A typical school day
